Package it.polimi.ingsw.resources.resourceSets

Class ConcreteResourceSet

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.resources.resourceSets.ConcreteResourceSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
LeaderCardRequirements, ResourceSet, Cloneable
public class ConcreteResourceSet extends Object implements ResourceSet, LeaderCardRequirements
ConcreteResourceSet is a container for ConcreteResources

      public int getCount​(ConcreteResource resource) throws InvalidResourceException
      getCount returns the number of occurrences of the given resource
      Parameters:
      resource - The ConcreteResource to count
      Returns:
      The number of occurrences of resource in the set
      Throws:
      InvalidResourceException - resource is null

    • addResource

      public void addResource​(ConcreteResource resource, int quantity) throws InvalidResourceException, InvalidQuantityException
      AddResource adds new ConcreteResources to the set
      Parameters:
      resource - The ConcreteResource to add
      quantity - The quantity to add
      Throws:
      InvalidResourceException - resource is null
      InvalidQuantityException - quantity is not strictly positive

    • removeResource

      public void removeResource​(ConcreteResource resource, int quantity) throws InvalidResourceException, InvalidQuantityException, NotEnoughResourcesException
      removeResource removes ConcreteResources from the set
      Parameters:
      resource - The ConcreteResource to remove
      quantity - The quantity to remove
      Throws:
      InvalidResourceException - resource is null
      InvalidQuantityException - quantity is not strictly positive
      NotEnoughResourcesException - There are less than quantity occurrences of resource in the set

    • removeResource

      public void removeResource​(ConcreteResource resource) throws InvalidResourceException, NotEnoughResourcesException
      This method offers the option to remove a single resource
      Parameters:
      resource - The ConcreteResource to remove
      Throws:
      InvalidResourceException - resource is null
      NotEnoughResourcesException - There are no occurrences of resource in the set

      Throws:
      InvalidResourceSetException

    • difference

      public void difference​(ConcreteResourceSet other) throws InvalidResourceSetException, NotEnoughResourcesException
      difference removes from this set all the resources contained in another ConcreteResourceSet
      Parameters:
      other - The given ConcreteResourceSet
      Throws:
      InvalidResourceSetException - other is null
      NotEnoughResourcesException - There aren't enough resources in this set to perform the operation

    • contains

      public boolean contains​(ConcreteResourceSet other) throws InvalidResourceSetException
      contains checks whether a given ConcreteResourceSet is a subset of this ConcreteResourceSet
      Parameters:
      other - The ConcreteResourceSet to check
      Returns:
      True iff other is a subset of this ConcreteResourceSet
      Throws:
      InvalidResourceSetException - other is null

    • isSatisfied

      public boolean isSatisfied​(Board board) throws InvalidBoardException
      isSatisfied implements the method of the LeaderCardRequirements interface It checks whether a given board contains all the resources indicated by this ConcreteResourceSet
      Specified by:
      isSatisfied in interface LeaderCardRequirements
      Parameters:
      board - The board of the current player.
      Returns:
      True iff board contains this ConcreteResourceSet
      Throws:
      InvalidBoardException - board is null

    • getResourceType

      public ConcreteResource getResourceType() throws NotSingleTypeException
      getResourceType returns what type of resource is contained in this ConcreteResourceSet
      Returns:
      The only type of ConcreteResource contained in this set or null if this set contains no resources
      Throws:
      NotSingleTypeException - This set contains more than one type of resources

    • isSingleType

      public boolean isSingleType()
      isSingleType checks whether this ConcreteResourceSet contains at most one type of resource
      Returns:
      True iff this set contains at most one type of resource
